actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the Federal Government should use recycled paper products to the fullest extent possible.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the Federal Government should use recycled paper products to the fullest extent possible, and that the Joint Committee on Printing, the General Services Administration, and all other germane governmental agencies should make every effort possible to carry out this policy.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the Federal Government should use recycled paper products to the fullest extent possible.
